text:
ASHUTOSH FIBRE LIMITED
[FORMERLY KNOWN AS ASHUTOSH FIBRE PRIVATE LIMITED]
10 The Company have not advanced or loaned or invested funds to any other person(s) or entity(ies), including foreign entities (Intermediaries) with the understanding that the Intermediary shall :
10.1 Directly or indirectly lend or invest in other persons or entities identified in any manner whatsoever by or on behalf of the Company (Ultimate Beneficiaries) or
10.2 Provide any guarantee, security or the like to or on behalf of the Ultimate Beneficiaries.

11 The Company have not received any fund from any person(s) or entity(ies), including foreign entities (Funding Party) with the understanding (whether recorded in writing or otherwise) that the company shall :
11.1 Directly or indirectly lend or invest in other persons or entities identified in any manner whatsoever by or on behalf of the Funding Party (Ultimate Beneficiaries) or
11.2 Provide any guarantee, security or the like on behalf of the Ultimate Beneficiaries.
12 The Company has not traded or invested in Crypto Currency or Virtual Currency during the financial year.
13 There has been no Charges or Satisfaction yet to be registered with ROC beyond the statutory Period.
14 Title Deeds of all immovable property are held in name of the company.
[FORMERLY KNOWN AS ASHUTOSH FIBRE PRIVATE LIMITED]

Alpesh R. Bhavsar
Chief Financial Officer
